messages.content: Kanha's technical skills include programming languages such as C, C++, Python, Java, and SQL, as well as database systems and software engineering. Additionally, he has experience with compiler design, AWS solution architecture, embedded systems, cryptography, and network security. Kanha also has a diverse range of technical interest areas such as mathematics, computer architecture, operating systems, artificial intelligence fundamentals, and network and database systems.
Tell me about Kanha's RAG projects
Kanha Khantaal has developed a custom RAG-based chatbot for an hospital, which uses Python, LangChain, and custom vector embeddings.
